welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Oak Forest, the charming city surrounded by beautiful nature and known for its friendly community. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all the unique experiences this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport is responsible for handling all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights and is home to United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights and is home to Delta Air Lines and Air Canada.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights and is home to American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights and is home to various airlines such as Lufthansa and Emirates.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greater Kankakee Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Greater Kankakee Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport, serving all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The dedicated terminal for handling cargo shipments at Municipal Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
